long_description: Keep tools, energy bars and other small items close at hand on every bike ride with the Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT. You'll love the easy-to-secure bungee seat-post attachment. Bungee and keeper attachment fit all seat post diameters. Strap with buckle attaches to rails in multiple positions. Built of rugged ballistic nylon construction with waterproof nylon accents. Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT has a wide zippered mouth for quick access. Large reflective patch doubles as a blinking light attachment (light not included). Closeout.
short_description: Keep tools, energy bars and other small items close at hand on every bike ride with the Timbuk2 Seat Pack XT. You'll love the easy-to-secure bungee seat-post attachment.
